attributes.additional_details: There's too many innocent parents aunties uncles brothers and sisters all losing out due to anothers selfishness
attributes.background: For the family courts to be assessed on how they handle false allocations  and then allow the other parent to stop contact with no reasonable explanation

rejection.details:
Decisions about family court cases are a matter for judiciary, not the Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make parent alienation a criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599005
